name: Ghost Fear
description:
4.2.2023:

Releasing first prototype of my first Ghost Hunting game that is in development for 6 months now. Project is, as of now, entirely free, so there is no reason not to try it! 

Any constructive feedback is appreciated (especially the negative one). This is my biggest project I've ever made to date.

What is it about?

Ever wanted to try a job of a Paranormal Investigator? - a very dangerous, yet exciting job! You will meet many Entities that will make you die over and over again, but also few ones that are friendly and are willing to cooperate! 

Select a Contract, get to investigation area, equip yourself with suitable items and go investigate! 

What type of Entity are you dealing with?

As of now features:

  • Over 20 AI Controlled Entities with various differences in mechanics and appearance
  • 3 Entity Categories/Natures: Common Spirit, Yokai and Demonic
  • Evidence Collecting
  • Contract Settings - Customise contract as much as you want by tinkering with dozens of different parameters!
  • 3 Maps (More to come)
  • Over 20 Equipment Items
  • Over 120 Map Items
  • Over 350 Sounds
  • Shop & Inventory System
  • Reputation System
  • Fuse boxes, room lights and other electricity based furniture
  • Levelling system that slowly unlocks more and more content to ease up the game as much as possible for newcomers
  • Puzzles
  • Jumpscares
  • Much much more...

Share your feedback on Community Discord
